EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send email to users once the delete batch job they have submitted to delete temporary user data uploaded through Data Loader has been completed.
EmailTemplate.name: Client_User_Import_Email_Template_Success
EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary client data deletion is successful
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The temporary client data, imported by the Data Loader, has been successfully deleted.
This message was automatically generated when the BMC Remedyforce administrator deleted the temporary client data imported by the Data Loader.
